ArticleTitle.sentence: A novel genetic system to isolate a dominant negative effector on DNA-binding activity of Oct-2.

event.clue: A novel genetic system to isolate a dominant negative effector on DNA-binding activity of Oct-2.

AbstractText.sentence: Recent studies have revealed that interactions between transcription factors play an important role in regulation of gene expression in eukaryotic cells.

event.clue: Recent studies have revealed that interactions between transcription factors play an important role in regulation of gene expression in eukaryotic cells.
Recent studies have revealed that interactions between transcription factors play an important role in regulation of gene expression in eukaryotic cells.
Recent studies have revealed that interactions between transcription factors play an important role in regulation of gene expression in eukaryotic cells.

AbstractText.sentence: To isolate cDNA clones that dominantly inhibit the DNA-binding activity of Oct-2, chosen as a representative factor, we have developed a novel screening system.

event.clue: To isolate cDNA clones that dominantly inhibit the DNA-binding activity of Oct-2, chosen as a representative factor, we have developed a novel screening system.
To isolate cDNA clones that dominantly inhibit the DNA-binding activity of Oct-2, chosen as a representative factor, we have developed a novel screening system.

AbstractText.sentence: This employs an Escherichia coli tester strain carrying a modified lac operon as a reporter gene, with the lac operator sequence replaced by an octamer sequence.
Oct-2 expressed in this tester strain represses the expression of the reporter gene and changes the phenotype of the cell from Lac+to Lac-.

event.clue: Oct-2 expressed in this tester strain represses the expression of the reporter gene and changes the phenotype of the cell from Lac+to Lac-.
Oct-2 expressed in this tester strain represses the expression of the reporter gene and changes the phenotype of the cell from Lac+to Lac-.
Oct-2 expressed in this tester strain represses the expression of the reporter gene and changes the phenotype of the cell from Lac+to Lac-.
Oct-2 expressed in this tester strain represses the expression of the reporter gene and changes the phenotype of the cell from Lac+to Lac-.
Oct-2 expressed in this tester strain represses the expression of the reporter gene and changes the phenotype of the cell from Lac+to Lac-.

AbstractText.sentence: Introduction of a cDNA expression library prepared from a human T-cell line into the Oct-2-harboring tester strain allowed selection of three Lac+clones out of 1 x 10(5) transformants.
One of them, hT86, encoding a putative zinc finger protein was found to derepress beta-galactosidase activity in the Oct-2-harboring tester strain at the transcriptional level.

event.clue: One of them, hT86, encoding a putative zinc finger protein was found to derepress beta-galactosidase activity in the Oct-2-harboring tester strain at the transcriptional level.

AbstractText.sentence: In gel mobility shift assays, hT86 attenuated the intensity of the retarded band composed of the octamer probe and Oct-2, suggesting a dominant negative effect on the DNA-binding activity of Oct-2.

event.clue: In gel mobility shift assays, hT86 attenuated the intensity of the retarded band composed of the octamer probe and Oct-2, suggesting a dominant negative effect on the DNA-binding activity of Oct-2.
In gel mobility shift assays, hT86 attenuated the intensity of the retarded band composed of the octamer probe and Oct-2, suggesting a dominant negative effect on the DNA-binding activity of Oct-2.

AbstractText.sentence: The strategy described here provides a new approach for studying protein-protein interactions that govern the complex regulation of gene expression.

event.clue: The strategy described here provides a new approach for studying protein-protein interactions that govern the complex regulation of gene expression.
The strategy described here provides a new approach for studying protein-protein interactions that govern the complex regulation of gene expression.
